trends: There have been 148 other sightings in San Antonio
There were no other sightings in San Antonio on or around February 2nd 2006
divs: Sighting DetailsI was in a car, windows down, and I noticed two bright objects.I was just playing around when my head flinched forcing me to look out the window.At first I thought it was a big plane.But it stopped and went in reverse.Then it took off at an estimate of 800 miles per hour.It kept changing colors of white, to red, to blue, and back to white.My rection was freaking out.
